mapper.select: select ticketorderid, orderdate, tickettypename, price, quantity, price * quantity AS totalprice FROM tickettype tt INNER JOIN ticketorder tto ON tt.tickettypeid = tto.tickettypeid ORDER BY orderdate DESC

select ticketorderid, orderdate, tickettypename, price, quantity, price * quantity AS totalprice FROM tickettype tt INNER JOIN ticketorder tto ON tt.tickettypeid = tto.tickettypeid WHERE orderdate >= #{startDate} AND orderdate <= #{endDate} ORDER BY orderdate DESC
